item.description:
Join me for a casual easy paddle Saturday and celebrate the Summer Solstice.

Round trip paddle on the Wood River starting in Richmond RI and paddling upstream about 3 miles. Break for lunch. Paddle back downstream. This is a very easy beautiful paddle.

No shuttle, so it will be quick and easy to get in and out without hassle.

Time: Arrive at 10 AM. In the water as soon as everyone is ready.

Location: Fishing Access at 22 Bridge St, Richmond, RI

DIRECTIONS:
I95 to Exit 3 in Richmond RI.
Head West on Route 138. If you see Wendy's and MacDonald's, you are going East. Turn around.
Go through traffic light bearing left, about 1 mile from exit.
Take first right onto Bridge Street.
Parking for fishing access is immediately on right.
item.how_to_find_us: Shaved head with Orange/Yellow Riot Kayak
item.name: Wood River
